title: Womens Maxi Dress Maxi V Neck
title_original: Women's Dress V Neck Backless Spaghetti Strap Maxi Dress for Women Flowy Boho Casual Sundress

specs.Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here
specs.Best Sellers Rank: #137,548 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry ( See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry ) #1,565 in Women's Casual Dresses

category: Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry > Women > Clothing > Dresses > Casual

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great find!!
items.body: I am obsessed with this dress! Quality is great, it’s not see through, and it’s super comfortable! The material is good quality and it’s very flattering. I feel like a princess in this dress. Highly recommend! Read more
items.author: Jea2762

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stunning summer dress!
items.body: Bought this for my daughter for her senior pictures! This dress is stunning! The material is gorgeous and it was perfect for beach photo shoot! She has it in a size small and it fits her perfectly! Read more
items.author: aimee c.

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice dress
items.body: I really like this women’s V-neck backless spaghetti strap dress. I wore it as a bathing suit cover-up and got several compliments on it. The top is lined, but the lining is thin, so if I were to wear it without a bathing suit, then I would need some sort of stick on bra or something for the chest area. The length is good for me. I’m 5’3” and 145 pounds. I bought a size small and it fits well. The dress has pockets and they are deep enough for a phone. The fabric is synthetic - 98% polyester and 2% elasticine but fairly soft. The straps are adjustable. The only issue I have with this dress is that the straps did not feel secure on my shoulders. The straps are sewn into the sides of the dress instead of the back of the dress which makes them less stable and gives a feeling that they may fall off. I think I would feel pretty secure with a little fabric tape under the straps if I was not wearing it as a cover-up. The dress washed well, though it needed some ironing to get all the wrinkles out. Read more
items.author: laura m

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty Dress, Cool and Light
items.body: This V Neck Backless Spaghetti Strap Sundress is a pretty dress. It looks like the picture. It's light yellow, and the material is light and cool. The material has no stretch, but there is an elastic strip under the breast area and in the back. It's a nice comfortable dress for a warm or hot day or night. I'm 5'4" and wear between small and medium. I ordered Small, and it fits well. The cups cover my 34Ds well, and the length comes to my ankles. The straps are adjustable, and there is a hidden pocket on each side. This dress is good value. Read more
items.author: L. D.

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Straps fall down
items.body: Shoulder straps are hard to stay on, also strap tightening get twisted easy Read more
items.author: Nicole L

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute beach dress with pockets!
items.body: Super cute vacation dress. It is a little low in the front... and back for that matter. But it is a great beach dress. I like the color. The fit is a tiny bit tight but not enough o matter. The quality is great and it even has nice lining. It also has POCKETS! That is always a win! Read more
items.author: SnL

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and classic.
items.body: This Women’s V Neck Backless Spaghetti Strap Sundress is a perfect blend of elegance and comfort. The dress itself is pale, yellow, and the cotton is comfortable.The lightweight fabric is ideal for warm weather, and the flattering silhouette drapes beautifully without clinging. The deep V neckline and open back add a touch of effortless charm, while the adjustable straps ensure a customizable fit. Whether you’re heading to the beach or a summer brunch, this dress feels airy, feminine, and stylish. Read more
items.author: Austin

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute-flattering
items.body: LOVE this dress! The fabric is soft, lightweight, and breathable—perfect for warmer weather. I especially love that it has two pockets, which makes it practical as well as cute. You can easily wear it casual during the day or dress it up a bit for a night out. The back is the perfect amount of backless—flattering without being too much. Definitely a new favorite! Read more
items.author: TMiller

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Pink, Yellow. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
